section.name: Current Astrogrid Releases
section.P: AstroGrid code is available at several levels of stability:

ul.li: SNAPSHOT - the latest bleeding edge code. Integration Tests results are available, but the code has not necessarily been accepted,
HEAD - the latest accepted code. This test has been tested and accepted by the integration team. It will usually be less than a week old.
Released - fully tested code is released approximately once every 3 months.

section.P: Follow the links to the left for the documentation for the current releases. This documentation in turn has links to the binaries, source code and installation information.

subsection.name: Itn08 Head
subsection.P: Head code has been tested and accepted by the integration team. It is guaranteed to build, and in general its integration test pass rate will increase monotonically with time.
Accepted code is deployed as needed to twmbarlwm:8888, but be aware that this machine can be withdrawn for use by the integration team without notice.
For a summary of the latest features and fixes see the changes report.
